content:
Goal: build useful tools
Hobbies: meditating, reading sci-fi, & learning machine learning
Recent Projects:
ScholarStats - scientometrics toolset
 provides enhanced citations analysis for scientific community built using Python, Selenium webdriver, Altair, Docker, Google Cloud Run & App Engine delivers more meaningful profiles statistics by scraping and wrangling data from Google Scholar profiles  QuickSlack - knowledge management
 provides semantic search and contextual auto-suggestion for Slack using a chatbot built with Pytorch, HuggingFace, Spotify’s Annoy index, Docker swarm, Amazon EC2, Rasa serves fine-tuned, transformer-based language model and approximate nearest-neighbors search indexes
